alerts.description:
At 118 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Falmouth, or
near Portland, moving north at 15 mph.

Half inch hail is possible with this storm.

Locations impacted include...
Portland, Brunswick, Topsham, Cumberland, Falmouth, Freeport, Gray,
Yarmouth, Harpswell, Durham, Chebeague Island, New Gloucester, Pownal
and North Yarmouth.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 295 between mile markers 6 and 31.
Interstate 95 between mile markers 51 and 54.

Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may cause
localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.
alerts.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:18PM EDT by NWS Gray ME

alerts.description:
The National Weather Service in Gray has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Southwestern Kennebec County in south central Maine...
Northwestern Sagadahoc County in south central Maine...
Androscoggin County in southwestern Maine...
East Central Cumberland County in southwestern Maine...

* Until 315 PM EDT.

* At 1211 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin
shortly in the advisory area.

Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Lewiston, Auburn, Brunswick, Topsham, Turner, Freeport,
Litchfield, Yarmouth, Lisbon, and Greene.
alerts.title: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 12:11PM EDT until July 14 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Gray ME

alerts.description:
The National Weather Service in Gray has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Southwestern Androscoggin County in southwestern Maine...
Central Cumberland County in southwestern Maine...
Southeastern Oxford County in western Maine...

* Until 215 PM EDT.

* At 1113 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin
shortly in the advisory area.

Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Auburn, Westbrook, Mechanic Falls, Naples, Cumberland, Gorham,
Falmouth, Gray, Raymond, and Yarmouth.
alerts.title: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 11:13AM EDT until July 14 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Gray ME
